div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1078 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1947 Burial: c. 300-250 B.C. Contents: 16 AE. In basement in upper town; 8 together in a corner and 8 nearby Olbia: 14 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 5 or 7 [1], 10-11 [2], 16 [1], 22 [1], 26-29 [8]; pl. 10, 1 [1]) Unc.: 2 AE Disposition: Kiev Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
